Description.Text: The third person pack features a playable character where the camera is positioned behind and slightly above the character. As the character moves using mouse, keyboard, controller or virtual joystick on a touch device, the camera follows the character, observing from an over-the-shoulder point of view. This perspective emphasizes the main character and is popular in action and adventure games. The example map in the pack contains a several objects that the player can jump upon and a ramp the player can walk up.

AssetTypes.Text: Animation Sequence, Animation Blueprint, Skeleton, Blend Space 1D, Skeletal Mesh
